docs.snippet: The beauty of this surprise all-Madrid Champions League final is that Atlético’s players and their coach genuinely and legitimately believe that they have a chance....
docs.lead_paragraph: The beauty of this surprise all-Madrid Champions League final is that Atlético’s players and their coach genuinely and legitimately believe that they have a chance.
docs.abstract: Christopher Clarey On Soccer column examines Champions League final matchup between Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid; notes that Atletico has a budget roughly one quarter the size of Real, and that it is seeking its first championship while Real has won 9; holds beauty of matchup is that Atletico legitimately believes it has a chance to win against powerhouse.

headline.main: In Champions League Final, a Battle for the Hearts of Madrid

docs.snippet: California Chrome, the speedy colt who established himself as the 5-2 morning-line favorite after winning four straight races by a combined 241/4 lengths, won the 140th running of the Kentucky Derby on Saturday....
docs.abstract: California Chrome, the speedy colt who established himself as the 5-2 morning-line favorite after winning four straight races by a combined 241/4 lengths, won the 140th running of the Kentucky Derby on Saturday.
